intro.title: About ASMS
intro.desc:
ASMS was founded by a team of Vietnamese and international professionals with over 20 years of experience in corporate services, real estate, and tourism management. We established ASMS to meet the growing demand for secure, convenient, and cost-effective self-storage solutions for individuals and businesses in Ho Chi Minh City. Our team, together with an integrated online platform, provides all the necessary tools and features to ensure seamless support for customers and their stored goods. 
The ASMS warehouse and office are located at the border of District 2 and District 9, just 10 minutes from the Thao Dien residential area, with convenient access to other parts of the city. With over 250 storage units (including standard and climate-controlled rooms), our facility includes large loading zones for trucks and spacious freight elevators for efficient handling.

safe.title: Safety, Ease of Use & Prime Location
safe.desc: ASMS warehouses are located in a central area, just 10 minutes from Thao Dien. Equipped with 24/7 CCTV surveillance and professional security services, our facilities ensure that your belongings are stored safely and securely at all times.
